Welcome to Gloobers

Be Friendly. Travel for free

How it works ?

Be friendly

Help your friends live unique trips by giving tailormade recommendations.

Get rewarded

You recommend, you earn. It's that simple. Every single time your

recommendations are followed, you get rewarded.

Travel for free

Use the rewards you earned to book any listing for free.

Popular destinations

London

Tel Aviv

New York

Paris

Spread the word... Travel the world

Bring your friends in the tribe and earn gloobies every single time they book a trip, recommend a listing or receive a reservation. Yes, every single time !
